name: Emoji recommender keyboard
tagline: Hackillinois 2015 Project. Using Socket.IO built a chatroom and using sentiment analysis to recommend corresponding emoji realtime

# Emoji_Recommender_keyboard
Hackillinois 2015 Project. Using Socket.IO built a chatroom and using sentiment analysis to recommend corresponding emoji realtime
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
